name: Doctor Boris
description:
Doctor Boris is an action arcade game in which you have to defuse bombs. The game-play remind a bit of Worm-games since for every step Boris takes a wall segment appears behind him. In addition to the bomb you see sticks of dynamite and skulls on the game board; dynamite is used to blow holes in the wall that appears after Boris and skulls kills Boris on contact. In each level you have to defuse a certain number of bombs before you move on to the next level. The bomb timer starts as soon as the bomb appears in the level so the player has to act fast. Each level is randomly generated so no level will be the same.

The game is written in Fast Basic.
